item.title: Millions of people to see their local council elections delayed
item.description: Most wanting a delay are Labour-led but two are Tory councils and one is a Lib Dem authority.

item.title: UK economy grew by 0.3% in November, beating forecasts
item.description: The economy was boosted by a rebound in car production and from the services sector.

item.title: UK 'considering options' as Russia expels British diplomat over spy claims
item.description: Moscow has accused the unidentified man of being an undercover spy working at the British embassy in Moscow.

item.title: Olivia Dean, Central Cee and Little Simz lead 2026 Mobo nominations
item.description: The musicians pick up four nominations each, as the ceremony moves to Manchester for the first time.

item.title: Federal agent shoots Minneapolis man in leg after attack, officials say
item.description: The agent was acting in self-defence after being attacked with a shovel, said the Department of Homeland Security.
